summary: i take it you like captain marvel? lol
question: i take it you like captain marvel? lol
answer:
Pshhhh no?

You mean Carol Susan Jane Danvers? The girl whose shitty misogynistic father wouldn’t pay to send her to college despite her superior grades and instead chose her younger brother? The girl who then chose to join the Air Force as soon as she turned 18 because she’d always dreamed of being able to fly and be an astronaut and had even hitchhiked to Cape Canaveral to watch a launch when she was younger? The girl who rose to the top of her class as a pilot and had the freaking call sign “CHEESEBURGER” because she’s also a giant dork? The WOMAN who was shot down and nearly tortured to death but was able to escape and provide key intelligence information so she was recruited into Air Force Intelligence? The woman who completed so many successful missions with the likes of Nick Fury and Wolverine and against Sabretooth and Black Widow that NASA saw her and was like HEY WE WANT YOU TO BE OUR YOUNGEST HEAD OF SECURITY EVER?!! So she retired from the Air Force as a COLONEL (outranking a Captain) and took the job with NASA which led to her coming into contact with the Kree Empire which resulted in a struggle where she was knocked into a machine that altered her DNA to make her a half-Kree superhuman? Then NASA couldn’t deal with what had happened and wouldn’t help her so they demoted her and she ended up becoming a journalist and wrote a scathing tell-all book about NASA. Who, after months and months of dealing with a dual personality and blackouts because NO ONE WAS FUCKING HELPING HER DEAL WITH WHAT HAPPENED TO HER, was finally able to get that help and then become one of the top superheroes in the world and ONE OF THE MIGHTIEST AVENGERS BECAUSE SHE’S EFFECTIVELY LIKE THE SUPERMAN OF THE MARVEL UNIVERSE?! THE WOMAN WHO ALWAYS WANTED TO FLY A PLANE BUT NEVER DREAMED ONE DAY SHE WOULDN’T EVEN NEED ONE!!

Nah… I mean… why would I like her? I don’t know what you’re talking about…

I LOVE HER SO FUCKING MUCH AND I NEED THE MOVIE NOW!!!

blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers Requested by: Jessica Drew Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Carol Danvers
Requested by: Jessica Drew

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone. Modern communication seems to have come to an end. What remains is radiowaves. People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on. Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

Carol slowly tuned through the channels on the old radio, she had crash landed on her reentry into the Earth’s atmosphere, and when she made it to Manhattan, the Tower was a wreckage. She heard the crackling sound of numbers coming through as she found an active channel –

This is Jessica Drew broadcasting for Carol Danvers. On the off chance you’re not in space and you’re out there, there’s somewhere safe. Haven. I’m here with Gerry. Clint is here. And Peter. Nat, Bobbi, Tony… I’ve saved you a room so you better get your ass here before someone steals it. Hope to see you soon! Love you, Kirk. Co-ordinates to follow…

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

tags: i was bored and having a mild panic attack
summary: so here's some random fandom math for you
body:
so here’s some random fandom math for you

if you started watching supernatural on january 1st, watched one episode consistently every day, and then finished the series *as it stands on this here day with 13 seasons and 287 episodes* you’d finish the series on October 14.

all thirteen seasons equate to 12,915 minutes with the median episode run time of about 45 minutes, give or take, or 215.25 hours.

one calendar year is 8,760 hours, minus approx. 215.25 hours leaves you with about 8,544.75 hours to do whatever else with your year.

all marvel movies are about 2 hours 10 minutes as a median, give or take a few minutes because I’m too lazy to find the exact medians for both of these questions. so if you watched all of them in (in this example, chronological order, starting with Iron Man (2008)) at deadset 12:00 A.M., and continued through all of them (excluding Ant Man and the Wasp because I forgot to include it, sorry) you’d have the entire MCU up to Infinity War finished by around the average American dinner time, which is 6 P.M. the next day.

With Ant Man and the Wasp, that’s another median 2 hrs 10 mins, so the entire MCU is not approx. 39.9 hours but approx. 42 hours.

Take all this math with a pinch or two of salt, because the figures aren’t exact and I’m definitely not the greatest at math.
